phrase.value: That's not a valid time period.
We were unable to find the page you were looking for.
Source and target accounts can not be the same.
There isn't enough data for this section.
Removing this account will wipe-out all the expenses, incomes, and recurrings tracked in it. Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want to remove this tag?
Are you sure you want to remove this payment method?
Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
Are you sure you want to un-register from Pibi?
You will lose all unsaved changes by closing the editor, are you sure you want to continue?
Are you sure you want to logout?
This operation may take a long time to complete. Pibi will not be able to respond to your input in the meantime. \n\nAre you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want to reset your account?
Your connection to the Pibi Cloud has been lost and could not be re-established. Please verify that you are connected to the Internet.
You can choose to continue in Offline mode. You will be able to make transactions, but they will be synced only when you're connected to the Internet again.
The address we attempted to contact: __address__
You can try again later, and if the issue still persists, feel free to open a ticket at the Support Center.
We were unable to deliver the email to your inbox. This might mean that your address is currently unreachable, or that we're having issues with our courier service.
It seems like it's taking too long to load the application data. This could mean one of few things:
In case of #2 and #3, reloading the page might help, but if it doesn't, please do report this as a bug by pushing the Reload button below.
connection to the Pibi Cloud failed while loading
there's a lot of data to be downloaded
a bug in the current version of Pibi
An unexpected error has occured while processing your last action. Unfortunately, we were unable to recover from it.
You can report this issue and notify us about it, or choose to ignore it.
Alternatively, you can still sign up by creating a Pibi account or by choosing a different service to sign-up with.

Our servers had an issue authenticating you using your __provider__ account. This could be caused by certain privacy settings which prevented us from creating an account for you, such as your email address not being provided.
A new version of Pibi is available and has been downloaded, but a restart is required for the changes to take effect.
Go to the Report view for this __segment__
Use currency symbols (ie: $ and not USD)
Whether you're on-the-go using your mobile phone, or on your desktop computer, Pibi is there for you.
Your devices will automatically sync to the
Choose from up to 166 currencies with exchange rates synchronized on a daily basis.
Manage expenses across multiple accounts, hassle-free.
Even if you're not currently connected to the Internet, you can still track expenses and sync them later.
Stay on top of your financial activity by organizing transactions using tags and payment methods.
Track your rent, car loan, or salary.
Find out where most of your money is coming from and going.
Whether you've bought a pair of shiny shoes or have just cashed in from your super-secret client, Pibi helps you track the money easily.
Unable to retrieve the account listing. Please verify your Internet connectivity and try again.
Unable to remove account at this time, please try again later.
Your account has been reset, you can now start over.
Your account could not be reset, please try again later, or file a bug ticket in our Support Center.
We were unable to submit the issue possibly because of a connectivity error. Please take the time to file a bug report via our Support Center.
Thank you for reporting the issue, our developers have been notified.
You must have at least one account.
Something went wrong generating the report for you, please try again later.
Your report is ready. Click to save.
Your report is ready and has been delivered to your email inbox.
The report could not be emailed to your inbox. Please try again later.
Please wait while we generate the report for you.
We were not able to update your default currency, please try again later.
Unable to connect to Pibi Cloud, you are now in offline mode.
That email is not registered to any Pibi account.
An email is being delivered to your inbox with further instructions, please check your inbox in a minute.
Something went wrong signing you up, please make sure you've filled out all the required fields and try again.
We were unable to retrieve the transaction listing, please try later.
No offline data is available for this transaction period.
You are no longer registered to Pibi. We hope you come back!
Unable to remove your registration at this time, please try again later.
Give feedback or ask for help.
To help us help you, please describe in detail what the issue is, and what you were doing when the issue occured.
Notify me of any follow-ups on this issue
This recurring transaction is de-activated, choosing to update will automatically re-activate it.
This chart plots your balance during the month. A healthy finance state would be represented by the bar being above 0.

This chart shows the difference between incomes and expenses. A healthy finance state would be represented by a minimal difference, ie: the height of the red bars should be close to the height of the green ones.
This table shows how much of your finances were done using each payment method.
This is a summary of the total amount of expenses, incomes, and savings through the month, as well as their average values across the days.
This is a summary of the total amount of expenses, incomes, and savings through the year, as well as their average values across the months.
Sign up or back to Login
Don't have an account? Sign up
Sign up or back to Login
Already have an account? Log in
Delete your Pibi user account entirely.
Taking this action will remove all transactions tracked in your account and allow you to start from a blank state.
Learn about Pibi's interface elements, how to get to important places, and what the buttons do.

You can change your email and password here.

You can also link your account to your Facebook and Google accounts so you can log-in to Pibi using any of them!

You can track expenses and incomes in many currencies in Pibi, but you must also choose a main currency as explained earlier in the Wizard.

In here you can manage everything related to those currencies.

This tour takes you through your account settings.

See you how you can personalize your account and take advantage of Pibi's customization features.
Your account settings can be reached via the Main Menu, right here.

To add a new payment method, you need to:

  • choose a meaningful name for it; like MasterCard, or PDA
  • choose a color to use when reporting transactions made using that payment method
Adding a new tag is as simple as clicking this button, choosing a name, and an icon.
Here you get to customize your payment methods.
Clicking this link will take us to the settings page.
This section lets you add and customize the tags you use.
Fill this in with how much money you spent.

Choose the currency that you spent the money with.

You can change the available currencies in your settings.
Get the action started by learning how to track some money you spent using Pibi.
The editor lets you fill in a number of details, but only the amount of the transaction is required.
Push the Expense button to show the editor.
Write a small note to remind you of the expense, like 'Lunch with Pibi'.
Specify the day you made the expense in. By default, Pibi chooses today's date for you.

Mark how you paid the money, like by using Cash or a Credit Card.

You can add and change your payment methods in your settings.
We're done, push this button to save the expense.

Since we've just had lunch together, you should tag the expense as a Food expense.

Tip: you can choose more than one tag when it makes sense.

Just like currencies and payment methods, you can customize your tags in your settings.

Congratulations! You've now added the expense to your activity feed.

Double-clicking on the transaction allows you to edit or remove it, using the editor we just learned how to use.

On mobile and tablet, you can perform a swipe gesture to the left or right instead of clicking.
Amount must be a positive number.
Amount must be a positive number.
You must specify how often the recurrence pattern should be applied.
No recurrence pattern specified. Available patterns are: daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly.
Monthly recurrence pattern requires at least one day of the month to track the transaction on.
You must assign a name to this recurring.
Weekly recurrence pattern requires the days of the week the transaction should be tracked on.
Yearly recurrence pattern requires the day of the month to track the transaction on.
Yearly recurrence pattern requires at least one month of the year to track the transaction on.
To help us help you, please describe in detail what the issue is, and what you were doing when the issue occured.
Notify me of any follow-ups on this issue
Select the currencies you wish to use for your transactions. Currently, we support __count__ currencies.
Our servers synchronize currency exchange rates on a daily basis . You can find the current exchange rates beside the currency ISO code and symbol.
The default currency you choose will be used to display your balance as well as be automatically selected whenever you create a new transaction.
This data is as accurate and up-to-date as the last time you viewed it online on this device.
You can set up transactions that recur automatically, like your salary, loans, and bills. Visit Pibi on the Web from a desktop computer or a laptop to manage your recurrings.
Visit Pibi on the Web from a desktop computer or a laptop to gain access to financial insights and reports.
